document.full_text: accused child-killer casey anthony called herself "the worst f***ing person" and predicted she would spend eternity in jail in text messages she sent a month after the murder of her daughter caylee, according to evidence introduced at trial on saturday.
document.title: casey anthony texts: "guess who spends eternity in jail"
lines_and_colors: accused child-killer casey anthony called herself "the worst f***ing person" and predicted she would spend eternity in jail in text messages she sent a month after the murder of her daughter caylee, according to evidence introduced at trial on saturday.
